topic.title: Add VLAN
topic.keywords: adding VLAN VLAN Id VLAN configuration

content.p: VLAN ID—The possible values for the VLAN ID are 1 to 4094. You cannot use an existing defined VLAN ID number. This field is required.
VLAN Name—This field is optional and limited to a maximum of 31 characters, including alphanumeric characters, dashes (-), underscores (_), and spaces.
To save the new VLAN, click Add.
